what: Administra Base de Datos de Reportes
title: Administra Base de Datos de Reportes
text: goal reportesAPI able get data Reportes instance use app analysis. user also .Renviron file containing following variables: DB_HOST DB_NAME DB_USER DB_SECRET DB_PORT REPORTES_EMAIL (Optional) package asumes using RMariaDB data storage.

title: Administra Base de Datos de Reportes
text: can install development version reportesAPI GitHub :

title: Administra Base de Datos de Reportes
text: basic example shows solve common problem: fetching data, instead returning data.frame, default get tibble. start instance AppData necessary provide email. done security reasons.
code: library(reportesAPI)  man <- DBManager$new() #> ℹ Connected to DB man$db_get_query("SELECT user_id, time_last_modified FROM users") #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   user_id                          time_last_modified  #>   <chr>                            <dttm>              #> 1 84f82757d27e55f7f781865524a7d0ae 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 2 81d8169fc25c672e452775ba5eec4cd8 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 3 243caa4a7de6f9212adbdc2f50ea97ec 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 4 d618dc956854bc12fa8084ae7f543dbd 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 5 3fd4eafdffff29d0f131304e35091549 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 6 2b4cd2e9a4a8f6f995e2a4ae0de7331e 2022-11-11 20:42:58 #> 7 25ec41daa87947b1d326d5515dc7b9a9 2022-11-11 20:42:58

title: reportesAPI 0.2.1
text: Fixed bug prevented add edit group units

title: reportesAPI 0.2.0
text: Added methods Group add, edit delete measurement units. also allows divide tasks reports.

title: reportesAPI 0.1.8
text: user creates group now ‘admin’ role instead ‘owner’. making necessary edit manually user role . Users now favorite group. default group getting tasks.

title: reportesAPI 0.1.7
text: Now can specify user color adding group

title: reportesAPI 0.1.6
text: Fixed bug prevented get org users names

text: Fixed bug prevented messaging adding user organisation group

title: reportesAPI 0.1.3
text: Fixed bug prevented group field treated regular list.

title: reportesAPI 0.1.2
text: Former public fields orgs, org_users, groups group_users now active fields

title: reportesAPI 0.1.1
text: Email now hanled environment variable. Now possible get data.frame task progress history.
